SELECT A.ADMIN_NO as adminNo, A.ADMIN_ID AS userId, A.NAME AS name, A.SEX, A.AGE, A.PROFILE, A.IMG_URL AS imgUrl, A.SHOP_NO as shopNo, B.SHOP_NAME AS shopName, C.STAR_POINT AS starPoint FROM ADMIN A LEFT JOIN SHOP B ON A.SHOP_NO = B.SHOP_NO LEFT JOIN STAR C ON A.ADMIN_NO = C.ADMIN_NO WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND B.SHOP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (A.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR B.SHOP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY C.STAR_POINT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMIN SET PROFILE = #{profile}, IMG_URL = #{imgUrl} WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{userId}
